subject: Relationships
title: Building a Relationship Mission Statement
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Building a Relationship Mission Statement.

hook.text: Companies have mission statements. Marriages usually don't. Maybe that's why so many lose direction.

buildup.text: A relationship mission statement defines shared values, goals, and commitments â€” a compass for difficult times.

discovery.text: Couples who articulate shared meaning report higher resilience during crises and transitions.

twist.text: It doesn't have to be formal. 'We choose laughter, honesty, and adventure' is enough to anchor a partnership.

climax.text: Love without direction drifts. A shared statement keeps partners rowing in the same direction together.

punchline.text: A shared mission keeps love on course when storms arrive.

quiz.question: What does a relationship mission statement provide?
options: A shared compass for values, goals, and difficult times
